description: The AUD_PUMP_PROG table contains audit trail information about infusion pump programming messages received back from the pumps.

columns.name: ALERT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the med alert record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: E_INF_SEND_INS_DTTM
columns.description: Audit trail for the instant when the pump program was sent to the infusion pump.

columns.name: E_INF_RESPONSE_DTTM
columns.description: Audit trail for the instant when the response was received from the infusion pump.

columns.name: E_INF_ADMIN_IN_DTTM
columns.description: Tracks the administration instant with the pump order details audit trail

columns.name: E_INF_ATTEMPT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Tracks the instant the user attempted to program the pump in the audit trail
